reviewText: i love watching the one person vine in all of the glow girls vine is my fave
CLASS HAS A NAME THIS MOVIE ROCKED LOVES THESE GIRLS AS A KID. CLASS AND GRACE AT THE SAME TIME.

This is a review of this product: G.L.O.W. Vol. 3 - Fans Beware DVD. Amazon may display this review on the page of another version of this product, for which this review may not apply. After reading this review, please click on the link so that you can be assurred that the product this review applies to is the same one you thought it was for. -------------------------------------------------- This DVD was previously released on VHS in 1986. Nothing has been edited out. Everything from the original videotape release is include here. By the way, all three GLOW DVDs contain the same slideshow and promo bonus features.

If you don't know what GLOW is, check out my reviews for volumes one and two. I'll just cut to the chase and tell you what's on this video (I have the video not dvd).
The Matches: 1) Jungle Woman & Spanish Red vs Susie Spirit and Debbie Debutante (2) Dementia vs Little Egypt (unusual but no commentary for this match...) (3) Dallas vs Colonel Ninotchka in a Texas Bar Room brawl match and (4) Eight girl tag team street fight - Hollywood, Vine, Envy & Adore vs Sally the farmer's daughter, California Doll, Tina and Ashley. The point of this match is to STRIP your opponents clothes off...kind of like a WWE "bra and panties" match.
There's skits, mini rap videos for some of the girls, and some crappy wrestling, but overall, fun to watch.
